issue.title: scrolller.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://scrolller.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fscrolller.com%2F) ### Comment > The site scrolller.com presents photos and videos randomly on its homepage, to sort and filter content the user must tap the options menu in the bottom right of the page. Normally this pops-up a dialog the user can then use to make selections. This dialog, a critical piece of the filtering UI, does not currently pop-up with AdGuard's Base Filter enabled. Username: `@carlbennett` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/a6se466flfcw0o8c4cs4so44ok8o84cepaje4sy954.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k7ge79u4zpscocgs0c8o0w0ww84k800pdvb32jwe80.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.49 MV2 System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection options: | Block WebRTC,

issue.title: Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://example.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?

Как в данном случае заменить 123 на 456 ?

```

<html abc="123" >

```

Вариант с простой replace - заменой текста отпадает. Страница рендерится "на лету".

p.s. Что промаркировать в опциях тикета стелс-режима при "высоком" уровне антитрекинга ?

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
>Они более высокоуровневые. Знание JS не всегда необходимо.

Можно пару примеров конкретно по данному кейсу для наглядности ?
